title: Formula for $$x_n$$
text: Use the formula $$x_n=F\left(x_n-1\right)$$ to define subsequent numbers $$x_n$$.
speech: Use the formula  x sub n is equal to   f of, parentheses x sub n minus 1,   to define subsequent numbers  x sub n .

title: Formula With $$n=1$$
text: To find $$x_1$$, use the formula $$x_n=F\left(x_n-1\right)$$ with $$n=1$$ and $$x_0=0$$.
speech: To find  x sub 1 , use the formula  x sub n, is equal to   f of, parentheses x sub n minus 1,   with  n is equal to, 1  and  x sub 0, is equal to 0 .
